sections.heading: About Me
body: I'm a University of Michigan student studying Computer Engineering. I aspire to do more with my degree than just earn a wage. With my degree I want to affect positive change in this world and work on projects that matter.

I want to do good works and affect positive change, but I don't have one box where I need to make that impact. There are many industries out there where I could see my work being impactful for more than just a nice salary, but also for the good of others. The space industry, nuclear power startups, education programs, or any number of industries have the potential to change lives. And, I would like to be at the center of that change.

sections.heading: Why a Portfolio?
body: A resume is nice, but it very quickly drops off old projects and experiences. Its brief nature doesn't give nearly enough detail and history on projects, that I promise, are a lot cooler than a resume blurb will lead you to believe.

So, with that in mind, I decided to start learning some HTML, CSS, and a bunch of other frontend tools that I discovered I would need later. With my summer internship with SEO (Sponsors for Educational Opportunity) I learned many of these skills through hands-on projects. Those skills made finishing up the website pretty easy and painless compared to earlier in the summer.

sections.heading: Reach Out!
body: This heading is fairly self explanatory, but, shoot me an email! I'm always looking for an opporotunity to make a connection, work on a new project, or just chat. Thats actually the primary reason I put together this website. I wanted to put more of myself out there for others to be able to take a look and connect.
If any of my projects look interesting, if theres anything I could help out with, or if you have any questions at all, I'd love to chat.
